entities.name: slughorn
entities.description: Slughorn is introduced as a teacher who has been observing Harry's scar and face. He mentions that Harry looks like his father.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as the son of James Potter (Harry's father) and Lily Evans (Harry's mother). Slughorn comments on how Harry resembles his father.

entities.name: james potter
entities.description: James Potter is mentioned by Slughorn as Harry's father. He describes James' students as being very bright.

entities.name: lily evans
entities.description: Lily Evans is mentioned by Slughorn as Harry's mother. He describes her as one of the brightest students he ever taught and vivacious.

entities.name: scar
entities.description: Harry's scar is mentioned by Slughorn as something that he has been observing.
